summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting easements over a portion of Edward Hanford Donation Claim No. 44 in southeast one-quarter of Section 9, Township 24 North, Range 4 East, W.M. (Neighborhood Improvement Project, Contract \#4, Sewer Improvement Project); over a portion of Lot 4, Block 2, Scenic Heights Addition to the City of Seattle No. 2 (Lake Washington - Central, Contract \#4, Sewer Improvement Project); over a portion of Lot 22, Block 8, Gilman's Addition (Alley, Block 8, Gilman's Addition, Storm Drain); over a portion of the southwest one-quarter of Section 25, Township 26 North, Range 3 East, W.M. (North Greenwood - West, Contract \#1, Storm Drain) for storm drain purposes.
